remarks: Rank membership is inherited by union.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement:
rankelun.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
rankelun.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
rankelun.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
rankelun.4 $e |- D e. _V $.
rankelun $p |- ( ( ( rank ` A ) e. ( rank ` C ) /\ ( rank ` B ) e. ( rank ` D ) ) -> ( rank ` ( A u. B ) ) e. ( rank ` ( C u. D ) ) ) $.
